extendedInfo.description: Compete for the best scores and times in this ultimate summer sports game designed specially for the touch screen with groundbreaking innovative and intuitive swipe controls. Make new world records in various disciplines like hurdle, long jump, archery or challenge and beat your friends in additional disciplines like meters, freestyle and javelin. Join players worldwide, challenge them and be the best! âââââ Regular content updates with new and amazing disciplines coming soon! ââââââ¨â¨â From the makers of various top 100 apps like Wingsuit Stickman, Stick Stunt Biker, Line Runner, Line Birds, Rope'n'Fly, Line Surfer, RunStickRun and more â¨â¨FEATURES:â¨ â¢ 12 amazing olympic disciplines including Meters, Hurdles, Javelin, Long jump, Freestyle and Archery â¢ Innovative natural feeling swipe gestures controlâ¨ â¢ Full challenge system with more than 100 different challenges to pass â¢ Kiip enabled, Get real world rewards when playing (e.g. discounts) â¢ Prize Money for each discipline â¨â¢ Customization shop to customize your player and other stuff with earned coinsâ¨ â¢ Fluid and smooth motion animationâ¨ â¢ Amazing Retina Graphicsâ¨ â¢ Online and Offline leaderboardâ¨ â¢ Game Center and Openfeint enabledâ¨ â¢ Directly compare yourself against all other players or your friends â¨â¢ and many more... â¨â¨â¨Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible â¨Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!

reviews.title: Ads before game
reviews.comment: How the hell do you try a game when 1mm from a control button is a link to an advertisers website? Ludicrous. Long jump? Rather have a big dump
reviews.author: Nathan Wright

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: I don\'t like the look but it is addictive and fun. I also dont like how the buttons are so far apart but all in all it is a pretty good app!

reviews.comment: Hahah . Good game . But very crazy

reviews.title: Not fun- not good.
reviews.comment: It is hard to make him go very fast at all and not addicting in the slightest bit. Unless you are so frustrated with it that you try over and over again. Do not get this app.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: So  good   app
reviews.author: Jean Corbin

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: The company who is marketing the free ringtones at the bottom of the screen that covers the jump button is smart not 2 feature the name of their company, because if they did, I would not only never purchase their ringtones, but would never purchase anything else from them either. Also, the fact that those making the marketing choices at the company producing this stick man game have allowed an advertisement 2 cover the imperative jump button is a huge mistake. After 10 min of play time, I\'m uninstalling it.
reviews.author: Heather McKinney

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: Advert over buttons. Automatic one star.  Bad form

reviews.title: Ads are in the way
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game except for the fact that ads are right in the middle of the buttons u need to play the game.  As ur playing if u accidentally touch one, which you will, it pulls u right out of the game.  Stupidest thing ever.
